alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:50AM CDT until June 15 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHICOT AND CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1250 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Greenville and Metcalfe around 100 AM CDT. Wayside around 105 AM CDT. Leland around 110 AM CDT. Arcola around 115 AM CDT. Estill around 120 AM CDT. Tribbett around 125 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
